WRITING.TITLE: Music during heroic dose/OBE/ego death?
WRITING.TEXT:
What has your experience been with listening to music while taking heroic doses (6+ grams of shrooms, 3 DMT hits)? Does it become more wonderful or does the experience itself become so important the sound stimuli becomes blas? If it does the former, what songs do you recommend?
I haven't tried it yet, but some songs I think would be great: degradation by Sigur Ros The Island of Children's Children by Mum Serpent Mound by This Will Destroy You New World BGM - Bo Kyung Kim Illium Faciem Tuam - Carlos Geusaldo (Sacred Works)
